Class DdlGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.DdlGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.avaje.ebeaninternal.api.SpiEbeanPlugin

    public class DdlGenerator
extends Object
implements com.avaje.ebeaninternal.api.SpiEbeanPlugin
    Controls the generation of DDL and potentially runs the resulting scripts.

        Specified by:
        setup in interface com.avaje.ebeaninternal.api.SpiEbeanPlugin
        Parameters:
        server - - the ebean server with extensions for all of the Ebean internals
        serverConfig - - the configured server information. It allows access to pre-collected information (but not the collector PropertySource, yet)
